title: Elemental Sound Effects
description: Discover an experience with our Elements Soundpack. This carefully curated collection of elements truly captures the essence of air, fire, earth and water.
longDescription:
Introducing the Elements Soundpack; Unleash the Power of Nature in Your Audio Projects!


Discover an experience with our Elements Soundpack. This carefully curated collection of elements truly captures the essence of air, fire, earth and water. It enables you to infuse your projects with the forces that shape our world.


🌬️ Air; Embrace the touch of a breeze or feel the powerful roar of a storm as you explore the versatile sounds of air. Whether you're creating soundscapes or simulating the rush of wind this element will take your audio to new heights.


🔥 Fire; Ignite your imagination with crackling and hissing sounds that embody fire. From the soothing crackle of a campfire to the fury of a wildfire adding Fire to your sound design brings warmth and intensity.


🌍 Earth; Establish a foundation for your compositions with deep and resonant tones inspired by Earth. Dive into vibrations, from soil, rocks and minerals or recreate seismic power from shifting tectonic plates. Earth provides stability for your projects.


💧 Water; Immerse yourself in the fluidity of waters beauty. Capture waves lapping on tranquil shores or experience the mighty roar of a waterfall.

You can use the Water element to bring an atmosphere or create captivating aquatic experiences.


DEMO SOUNDS
technicalDetails:
Features:

  •  Air
  •  Fire
  •  Earth
  • Water


Number of Audio Waves: 106

Number of Audio Cues: 106

Sample rate / bit rate: WAV 96K 24bit

Do Sound FX loop: Yes

Minutes of audio provided: 4 minutes

Supported Development Platforms:

Windows: Yes

Mac: Yes

Documentation: Link

Important/Additional Notes: Single user license, royalty-free
